original_text: All of them take something for themselves from the land. The king himself receives his share of the crops.
korean_text: 땅의 소산물은 모든 사람을 위하여 있나니 왕도 밭의 소산을 받느니라

sentences.original_text: All of them take something for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 모두는 자신을 위해 무언가를 취합니다

sentences.original_text: The king himself receives his share
